    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildingPolicy

        public BuildingPolicy(java.lang.String aPolicyNo,
                      int aYearOfIssue,
                      double aRisk,
                      double aRebuildCost)
               throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructing a new Building Policy instance
        Parameters:
        aPolicyNo - a given policy no. to be given to the new policy
        aYearOfIssue - a year of issue to be given to the new policy
        aRisk - a number representing the risk of insuring the property
        aRebuildCost - an estimated rebuild cost of the property to be insured
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - in case risk in not between 0 and 1
